name: CreateServiceAccountAppKey
description:
Create an application key for a service account.

Use this tool to create a new application key for a specified service account on Datadog. It should be called when an application key is needed for service account integration or access.

parameters.name: service_account_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the service account for which the application key will be created.

value_schema.description: The ID of the service account.

parameters.name: application_key_name
parameters.description: The name for the application key to be created for the service account.

parameters.name: application_keys_resource_type
parameters.description: Specify the resource type for the application key. This should always be 'application_keys'.

parameters.name: application_key_scopes
parameters.description: List of scopes to assign to the application key for specific permissions.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: service_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the service account.

value_schema.description: The ID of the service account.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.
